string.text: Eliminate the potential threat at the gas station
Some dim lights have been spotted at the deserted gas station at night. Investigate the situation and eliminate any potential threat.
Follow the signal of Fang’s PDA
Freedom’s technician has cracked Fang’s PDA frequency. You can now track Fang’s movements. According to the signal, Fang is currently at the Garbage. Follow the signal from Fang’s PDA.
Find out what happened at the outpost
It seems a Freedom outpost has been attacked yet again. Find out what happened and check for survivors at the outpost.
According to information provided by the diggers, Fang went to the Dark Valley in search of the remaining components. Find Freedom’s base and ask about Fang there.
The commandant’s PDA contains a lot of information, which can help Freedom work out who is attacking them and how they’re getting into the Dark Valley. Deliver the PDA to the leader of Freedom.
The mercenaries’ main base has been discovered. Help Freedom destroy it. This will allow Freedom to stop the attacks and establish complete control over the Dark Valley.
The PDA of one of the dead Freedom fighters is still active. Find the PDA - it may contain valuable information.
The PDA of one of the Freedom fighters killed at the outpost contains a recording of a conversation between the attackers. The recording will help to identify the attackers. Take the PDA to Chekhov.
Get ammo for the Freedom outpost from Ashot.
Kill the psy-dog, which is making a nuisance of itself near the Freedom base.

The PDA at the outpost contained a recording of a conversation between the attackers. The conversation mentioned that it was the commandant who sold the information that allowed the attackers to carry out swift and unexpected strikes against Freedom patrols. Find the traitor and deliver him to Chekhov - dead or alive.
Bring the component to the technician
Bring the component to the technician.
Capture and hold antennas to scan the area.
Capture and hold antennas to scan the area.
The commandant’s buddies killed him after Freedom started looking for him. His PDA contains important information about the people he helped.
You located a group of bandits inside the deserted gas station. Destroy them.
You located and destroyed a group of bandits inside the deserted gas station. Go see the barman and tell him about it.
Find information about barrels for sniper rifles
Freedom’s technician, Yar, specializes in high-precision weapons. He’s looking for information about barrels for sniper rifles.
Find information about an electronic stabilizer for sniper rifles
Yar the technician will pay well for detailed information about the electronic stabilization mechanism for sniper rifles.
Find information about muzzle breaks for sniper rifles
Yar the technician needs information on the workings of muzzle breaks for powerful sniper rifles. Then he’ll be able to make a similar one.

There was a guy around here with a real good scope on his shooter, the kind you won’t find anywhere in the Zone. I tried and tried but he didn’t want to sell it to me. He left with one of our patrols headed towards the Cordon. The patrol didn’t make it back, so I figure that stalker found his resting place somewhere around there. Bring me that scope, so I can give it to Chekhov as a gift - maybe he’ll promote me to commandant.
Return the USB drive with movies

Help me out, bud. Me and Ganja were sitting at his place, watching a movie on his laptop when the commandant caught us and started going on about how I’m on duty and all that. He wanted to smash the laptop into pieces but we stopped him, so he took the USB drive with the movie on it and threw it over the fence, into the radioactive area. Get that drive back and Ganja will reward you.

Someone stole Serega’s guitar, can you imagine that? He’s the only one who can play the guitar around here, and he does it well too, unlike the rest of them. We figured out who the thief is real quick but the cocksucker hid it someplace. Bring that guitar back ’cause Serega refuses to play any other, OK?
